solution_line_template: Monday through Saturday Juanita buys the paper for ${daily_cost_weekday} so that's {weekdays_per_week}*${daily_cost_weekday} = $<<{weekdays_per_week}*{daily_cost_weekday}={weekly_weekday_cost}>>{weekly_weekday_cost}

She spends ${daily_cost_sunday} for Sunday and ${weekly_weekday_cost} for the other 6 days so she spends ${daily_cost_sunday} + ${weekly_weekday_cost} = $<<{daily_cost_sunday}+{weekly_weekday_cost}={weekly_total_cost}>>{weekly_total_cost} for the newspaper weekly

Juanita spends ${juanita_yearly_cost} on the newspaper for the year and Grants spends ${grant_yearly_cost} a year so Juanita spends ${juanita_yearly_cost}-${grant_yearly_cost} = $<<{juanita_yearly_cost}-{grant_yearly_cost}={difference_in_cost}>>{difference_in_cost} more
